child.name: (b) And select one of the following:
One laboratory can be satisfied with completion of Excellence in Research in the Biological Sciences.
(b) Select three four-unit courses from the following:

BIO SCI E118â€“E190. These electives fall into three areas (ecology, evolution, and physiology), but students may take any combination of three courses from BIO SCI E118 to BIO SCI E190 and are not required to distribute them among these three areas.
Miniumum one quarter of independent study, usually BIO SCI 199. BIO SCI 197 can be substituted for BIO SCI 199.
Double majors within the School of Biological Sciences or with Public Health Sciences, Biomedical Engineering: Premedical, Nursing Science, or Pharmaceutical Sciences are not permitted.
